channel.title: All Show No Go
channel.description:
I usually take pictures of cars I see as all show no go. So here's some of them, post some if you have any. Kind of a discussion about them too.
[IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b125/rebelben9/Ricer1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b125/rebelben9/Ricer2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b125/rebelben9/Ricer3.png[/img]

item.title: All Show No Go
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:10, topic:279653”][quote author=Waffendennis link=topic=369045.msg2796930#msg2796930 date=1243117252]
God damn, I hate those ‘tuners’ who ruin a car!
The Honda on the first pic doesn’t look that bad, but that Integra… DAMN!?

I prefer the ‘sleeper’ look. Nothing beats the faces of drivers that get beaten by a car that looks stock/slow.
[/quote]The good ol days with the sleeper station wagons.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8Hd93tosCs

I’d love to see the Camaro drivers’ face.

EDIT: same with http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EhrfjIh5ACU[/quote]

Now that’s priceless lol. My 79 cutlass looks stock, and almost sounds stock. But it’ll do a deep 12 in the quarter.

Read full topic

item.title: All Show No Go

item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Waffendennis, post:6, topic:279653”]God damn, I hate those ‘tuners’ who ruin a car!
The Honda on the first pic doesn’t look that bad, but that Integra… DAMN!?

I prefer the ‘sleeper’ look. Nothing beats the faces of drivers that get beaten by a car that looks stock/slow.[/quote]

You should have heard the first one run, it sounds like a fat guy taking a shit. It’s just I don’t agree with making a four banger a race car. The cost is way too much.

item.title: All Show No Go
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Moparisthebest:

99% of the Japanese cars I see on the road are no go. Most of them are no show too though, only the idiots put fartbox mufflers, wings, and nice wheels on POS cars like that.

Lol yeah first thing I did when I bought my car was get rid of the fart box.

Read full topic
